channel.title: Zamot Personal Notes
channel.description: Recent content on Zamot Personal Notes

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Michael Zamot and I am a Principal Consultant at Red Hat. I am an open source and free software enthusiast. I am Costa Rican-American and I follow Vedanta. This is my personal space, where I’ll publish technical and personal content. Follow me on Mastodon

item.title: First Post
item.description: As the year 2022 approaches its end, I want to start blogging about the technology I am working on, among other stuff I do day to day.
